song.englishname: 3. There Could Be Nothing After This

english.segment1: In the end we tend to think of how it began. I could never explain the picture it painted, and how it made me feel. Now the ceiling is in motion. The light centered and overlooked. You want to see me disappear? Well, so do I
english.segment3: We're nothing but hollow vessels in search of what makes us alive. I never said this was my revolution when you looked me in the eye. Oh, how I've walked this white line so many times before. What a feeble attempt just to feel alive
english.segment4: This is for you and your hopeless case. You would never leave me in your wish to fail every time. Every time I try
english.segment5: So talk about it. At least it makes you feel something inside
english.segment6: Who have I become. Oh God, everything all around me is crumbling at my feet
english.segment7: I stare so delicate and ashamed. At the shell I've shed myself from
english.segment8: In the eyes of my ghost. And I will never look back again.
